content_html: Songs of Forgotten Trees, which won the Orizzonti Award at Venice, marks the first such win by an Indian director.
content_text: Songs of Forgotten Trees, which won the Orizzonti Award at Venice, marks the first such win by an Indian director.
summary: Songs of Forgotten Trees, which won the Orizzonti Award at Venice, marks the first such win by an Indian director.
title: 'No sugar-coated cinema for me': Indian director who scripted history at Venice
